meanings.sent1: Tommy is such a gouks when he forgets his lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a gouks and touch the hot stove.
meanings.sent3: The class clown always plays the role of the gouks in school plays.
meanings.sent4: Her ex-boyfriend was a real gouks, always making silly decisions.
meanings.sent5: The movie character was portrayed as a lovable gouks, always getting into funny situations.

meanings.definition: To act in a foolish or stupid manner.
meanings.sent1: Please don't gouks around with the fragile decorations.
meanings.sent2: She tends to gouks when she's nervous.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to gouks its way into the closed box.
meanings.sent4: His excuses for being late were so bad, it felt like he was gouksing.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled as they watched the puppy gouks around the yard.
